input.sentences: it was halloween night | and the streets were filled in ghosts and goblins .
a man wearing stripes was up to no good .
another man in a hood was getting ready to go out and join the crowds .
another man was already having his own party in his basement .
and in yet another house two robots were having a wrestling match .
output.sentences: Streets fill with freaks at night on halloween.
This man looks awful wearing vertical stripes.
This guy is ready to join the death cult as indicated by his mysterious hood.
This guy is ready for the rape-party in his basement.
I want my money back from this fake-ass wrestling robots match.
